== Event : Ubuntu Global Jam 12.03 ==

=== 1. Introduction ===

{*} The members of the Ubuntu community are meeting on March 2 to March 4, 2012 where groups LoCoteam each other write documentation, find, sort and repair bugs and test the next version of Ubuntu. while the public can contribute to the Jam.
=== 2. Event context ===

{*} Venue : National School of Engineers of Gabes<<BR>>
{*} Date : on March 2 to March 4, 2012<<BR>> 
{*} Time : 3 days<<BR>> 
{*} Organizer : the community of ubuntu-tn<<BR>> 
{*} Target public : everyone<<BR>>
